DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetics Diazepam Nasal Spray follow single dose epileptic patient experience seizure episode .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Single-Dose Diazepam Nasal Spray Adult Epileptic Patients Experiencing Seizure Episode
DOC.criteria: Provide sign informed consent study participation . General good health clinically significant unstable abnormality . Diagnosis epilepsy . Individuals receive warfarin ( Coumadin® ) dabigatran ( Pradaxa® ) . Use investigational drug within 30 day . Blood plasma donation within 30 day . Not willing unable tolerate blood draw .
